0: A tool with a round, concave part and a long handle used to scoop up rice, soup, etc.
A unit used to count the amount of food such as rice, etc., one can scoop up with a spoon.

1: 밥이나 국물 따위를 떠먹는 기구. 은ㆍ백통ㆍ놋쇠 따위로 만들며, 생김새는 우묵하고 길둥근 바닥에 자루가 달려 있다.
밥 따위의 음식물을 ‘「1」’로 떠 그 분량을 세는 단위.

0: A tool with a round, concave part and a long handle used to scoop up rice, soup, etc.
A unit used to count the amount of food such as rice, etc., one can scoop up with a spoon.
The act of using a spoon to eat food.
